link.label: FeatureIDE
link.text: FeatureIDE is an Eclipse-based IDE that supports building program families following the AHEAD architecture model. It provides tools for the feature oriented design process and the implementation of software product lines. It integrates AHEAD, FeatureC++ and FeatureHouse tools like composition tools, compilers and more. It also provides a Cheat Sheet Tutorial for your first Project. Help-> Cheat Sheets-> FeatureIDE
